name: Fred
description:
You should walk up to every sprite the color of your character, just so you can know stuffs n such.

This was made for the Pizza jam 3 game jam, it was made in about 6 hours and 39 minutes, the game has 6 endings, one of the endings took about 2 hours and 27 minutes. I joined in when there was 1 day left.  though theres 20 hours left while typing this I entered 5 more game jams so seeya.

btw walk with wasd.

and to get other endings you have to be creative. kinda.

Oh and there is a hidden pizza.
